testcase.name: Validate the TextBoxes component under Elements Tile
testcase.system-out: Given User launched a Browser...............................................passed When User opens url "https://demoqa.com"....................................passed Then User verify title of landing Page "DEMOQA".............................passed When User cliks on Elements tab.............................................passed Then User clicks on Text Box button on left rail elements...................passed And User enters all the values under the textboxes..........................passed And User clicks on Submit button............................................passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
